comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Captain Frederick Lincoln Chapin, commander of the U.S. battleship Wyoming. The same photo in The Washington times., December 17, 1913, LAST AND HOME EDITION, Page 7 He was seriously ill. See a more detailed article in The Washington herald., December 16, 1913, Page 6, first column "OFFICER BROUGHT DYING TO PORT". He died on December 19, 1913, see The New York Times, December 20, 1913. He was 50 years old. "The third Wyoming (Battleship No. 32) was ... commissioned at the Philadelphia Navy Yard on 25 September 1912, Capt. Frederick L. Chapin in command." www.history.navy.mil/danfs/w11/wyoming-iii.htm

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for adding this information B-59.  We'll add the name of the ship he commanded to the record the next time we update.
